scripts.build-deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.aws-deploy: scp -i /Users/luy/Downloads/KEY/MyHomeDefaultKey.pem -r dist/* ubuntu@3.107.23.106:/var/www/aws-server/vt3-test/dist/ && ssh -i /Users/luy/Downloads/KEY/MyHomeDefaultKey.pem ubuntu@3.107.23.106 "sudo systemctl reload nginx"
